00049 LocalBroker::LocalBroker(PropertiesPtr &cfg) {
00050   m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("verbose");
00051 
00055   Path root = cfg->get_str("root", "");
00056 
00057   if (!root.is_complete())
00058     root = Path(System::install_dir) / root;
00059 
00060   m_rootdir = root.directory_string();
00061 
00062   // ensure that root directory exists
00063   if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(m_rootdir))
00064     exit(1);
00065 }

00073 void
00074 LocalBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, uint32_t bufsz) {
00075   int fd;
00076   String abspath;
00077 
00078   HT_DEBUGF("open file='%s' bufsz=%d", fname, bufsz);
00079 
00080   if (fname[0] == '/')
00081     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00082   else
00083     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00084 
00085   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_unique_id);
00086 
00090   if ((fd = ::open(abspath.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) == -1) {
00091     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00092     report_error(cb);
00093     return;
00094   }
00095 
00096   {
00097     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00098     OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataLocal(fd, O_RDONLY));
00099 
00100     cb->get_address(addr);
00101 
00102     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00103 
00104     cb->response(fd);
00105   }
00106 }

00109 void
00110 LocalBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, bool overwrite,
00111                     int32_t bufsz, int16_t replication, int64_t blksz) {
00112   int fd;
00113   int flags;
00114   String abspath;
00115 
00116   HT_DEBUGF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufsz=%d replication=%d blksz=%lld",
00117             fname, (int)overwrite, bufsz, (int)replication, (Lld)blksz);
00118 
00119   if (fname[0] == '/')
00120     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00121   else
00122     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00123 
00124   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_unique_id);
00125 
00126   if (overwrite)
00127     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00128   else
00129     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00130 
00134   if ((fd = ::open(abspath.c_str(), flags, 0644)) == -1) {
00135     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00136     report_error(cb);
00137     return;
00138   }
00139   HT_DEBUGF("created file='%s' fd=%d", fname, fd);
00140 
00141   {
00142     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00143     OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataLocal(fd, O_WRONLY));
00144 
00145     cb->get_address(addr);
00146 
00147     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00148 
00149     cb->response(fd);
00150   }
00151 }

00154 void LocalBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00155   HT_DEBUGF("close fd=%d", fd);
00156   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00157   cb->response_ok();
00158 }

00161 void LocalBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00162   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00163   ssize_t nread;
00164   uint64_t offset;
00165   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00166 
00167   HT_DEBUGF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00168 
00169   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00170     char errbuf[32];
00171     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00172     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00173     return;
00174   }
00175 
00176   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, 0, SEEK_CUR)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00177     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=0 SEEK_CUR - %s", fdata->fd,
00178               strerror(errno));
00179     report_error(cb);
00180     return;
00181   }
00182 
00183   if ((nread = FileUtils::read(fdata->fd, buf.base, amount)) == -1) {
00184     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00185               strerror(errno));
00186     report_error(cb);
00187     return;
00188   }
00189 
00190   buf.size = nread;
00191 
00192   cb->response(offset, buf);
00193 }

00196 void LocalBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd,
00197                          uint32_t amount, const void *data, bool sync) {
00198   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00199   ssize_t nwritten;
00200   uint64_t offset;
00201 
00202   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"append fd="<< fd <<" amount="<< amount <<" data='"
00203       << format_bytes(20, data, amount) <<" sync="<< sync << HT_END;
00204 
00205   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00206     char errbuf[32];
00207     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00208     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00209     return;
00210   }
00211 
00212   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, 0, SEEK_CUR)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00213     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=0 SEEK_CUR - %s", fdata->fd,
00214               strerror(errno));
00215     report_error(cb);
00216     return;
00217   }
00218 
00219   if ((nwritten = FileUtils::write(fdata->fd, data, amount)) == -1) {
00220     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00221               strerror(errno));
00222     report_error(cb);
00223     return;
00224   }
00225 
00226   if (sync && fsync(fdata->fd) != 0) {
00227     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00228     report_error(cb);
00229     return;
00230   }
00231 
00232   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00233 }

00236 void LocalBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00237   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00238 
00239   HT_DEBUGF("seek fd=%lu offset=%llu", (Lu)fd, (Llu)offset);
00240 
00241   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00242     char errbuf[32];
00243     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00244     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00245     return;
00246   }
00247 
00248   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00249     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%llu - %s", fdata->fd, (Llu)offset,
00250               strerror(errno));
00251     report_error(cb);
00252     return;
00253   }
00254 
00255   cb->response_ok();
00256 }

00262   HT_DEBUGF("remove file='%s'", fname);

00283 
00284   HT_DEBUGF("length file='%s'", fname);
00285

00287     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;

00290

00302 void
00303 LocalBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset,
00304                    uint32_t amount) {
00305   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00306   ssize_t nread;
00307   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00308 
00309   HT_DEBUGF("pread fd=%d offset=%llu amount=%d", fd, (Llu)offset, amount);
00310 
00311   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00312     char errbuf[32];
00313     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00314     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00315     return;
00316   }
00317 
00318   if ((nread = FileUtils::pread(fdata->fd, buf.base, amount, (off_t)offset))
00319       == -1) {
00320     HT_ERRORF("pread failed: fd=%d amount=%d offset=%llu - %s", fdata->fd,
00321               amount, (Llu)offset, strerror(errno));
00322     report_error(cb);
00323     return;
00324   }
00325 
00326   buf.size = nread;
00327 
00328   cb->response(offset, buf);
00329 }

00343     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(),
00344               strerror(errno));

00346     return;

00353 void LocalBroker::rmdir(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00354   String absdir;
00355   String cmd_str;
00356 
00357   if (m_verbose) {
00358   HT_DEBUGF("rmdir dir='%s'", dname);

00360 
00361   if (dname[0] == '/')
00362     absdir = m_rootdir + dname;
00363   else
00364     absdir = m_rootdir + "/" + dname;
00365 
00366   cmd_str = (String)"/bin/rm -rf " + absdir;
00367   if (system(cmd_str.c_str()) != 0) {
00368     HT_ERRORF("%s failed.", cmd_str.c_str());
00369     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, cmd_str);
00370     return;
00371   }
00372 
00373 #if 0
00374   if (rmdir(absdir.c_str()) != 0) {
00375     HT_ERRORF("rmdir failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00376     report_error(cb);
00377     return;
00378   }

00384 void LocalBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dname) {
00385   std::vector<String> listing;
00386   String absdir;
00387 
00388   HT_DEBUGF("Readdir dir='%s'", dname);
00389 
00390   if (dname[0] == '/')
00391     absdir = m_rootdir + dname;
00392   else
00393     absdir = m_rootdir + "/" + dname;
00394 
00395   DIR *dirp = opendir(absdir.c_str());
00396   if (dirp == 0) {
00397     HT_ERRORF("opendir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00398     report_error(cb);
00399     return;
00400   }
00401 
00402   struct dirent dent;
00403   struct dirent *dp;
00404 
00405   if (readdir_r(dirp, &dent, &dp) != 0) {
00406     HT_ERRORF("readdir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00407     (void)closedir(dirp);
00408     report_error(cb);
00409     return;
00410   }
00411 
00412   while (dp != 0) {
00413     if (dp->d_name[0] != '.' && dp->d_name[0] != 0)
00414       listing.push_back((String)dp->d_name);
00415 
00416     if (readdir_r(dirp, &dent, &dp) != 0) {
00417       HT_ERRORF("readdir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00418       report_error(cb);
00419       return;
00420     }
00421   }
00422   (void)closedir(dirp);
00423 
00424   HT_DEBUGF("Sending back %d listings", (int)listing.size());
00425 
00426   cb->response(listing);
00427 }

00430 void LocalBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00431   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00432 
00433   HT_DEBUGF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00434 
00435   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00436     char errbuf[32];
00437     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00438     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00439     return;
00440   }
00441 
00442   if (fsync(fdata->fd) != 0) {
00443     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00444     report_error(cb);
00445     return;
00446   }
00447 
00448   cb->response_ok();
00449 }

00457 void LocalBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00458   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00459   cb->response_ok();
00460   poll(0, 0, 2000);

00478 void
00479 LocalBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00480   String asrc =
00481     format("%s%s%s", m_rootdir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00482   String adst =
00483     format("%s%s%s", m_rootdir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00484 
00485   HT_DEBUGF("rename %s -> %s", asrc.c_str(), adst.c_str());
00486 
00487   if (std::rename(asrc.c_str(), adst.c_str()) != 0) {
00488     report_error(cb);
00489     return;
00490   }
00491   cb->response_ok();
00492 }

00494 
00495 void LocalBroker::report_error(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00496   char errbuf[128];
00497   errbuf[0] = 0;
00498 
00499   strerror_r(errno, errbuf, 128);
00500 
00501   if (errno == ENOTDIR || errno == ENAMETOOLONG || errno == ENOENT)
00502     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf);
00503   else if (errno == EACCES || errno == EPERM)
00504     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf);
00505   else if (errno == EBADF)
00506     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00507   else if (errno == EINVAL)
00508     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf);
00509   else
00510     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf);
00511 }
